name: YellowCubeDude
description:
Controls: Jump MB1 thats kinda it since its all you do...

YellowCubeDude is a random game I made to test some lighting stuff for games it is not a good game. but you can play it anyways note that there are lots of random glitches since this is a game made in a short time for testing it might not even run on some devices... hope it still works for you thanks also the score is only visable in fullscreen mode. and you cant see it at all on mobile the rest works fine.
